faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to your main questions. If you don't find it here, our chat responds in minutes.

q1.question: Do I need to know about crypto to use diBoaS?
q1.answer:
Not at all! Most of our users had never invested before.

Aqua was built specifically for complete beginners. It explains every term, every step, every decision.

It's like having a patient friend teaching you.

q2.question: How much do I need to start?
q2.answer:
$10 is enough.

Seriously. Ten dollars.

The idea is for you to start small, build confidence, and then increase when you feel comfortable.

q3.question: How long does it take to open an account?
q3.answer:
Less than 5 minutes.

You'll need:
- Social Security Number / Tax ID
- Phone with camera (for selfie verification)
- A valid email

That's it. No paperwork, no bureaucracy.

q4.question: How do these guides work?
q4.answer:
They're AI assistants that observe how you use the app and reveal new features when you're ready.

Real example:

Week 1: You only see Aqua. You make your first $10 investment.

Week 3: You've made 5 small investments and are exploring the app.
Mystic appears: "Want to learn about stocks and ETFs?"

Month 3: You have a diversified portfolio. Coral suggests: "I see you understand risk. Want to explore high-yield DeFi?"

You never see everything at once. Just what you need right now.

q5.question: Will I always see all the guides?
q5.answer:
No! You start with just Aqua.

Mystic and Coral appear progressively as you're ready for more advanced features.

This prevents overwhelm while preserving sophistication.

q6.question: Can I "go back" if something gets too complicated?
q6.answer:
Always.

There's a "Simplify" button on any screen. If you activated something and found it confusing, just turn it off.

No penalties, no questions asked.

q7.question: Are the guides mandatory?
q7.answer:
No. You can use the app without them.

But 94% of our users prefer to keep the guides active because they really help prevent getting lost.

q8.question: Is my money safe on diBoaS?
q8.answer:
Yes. Same security standards as major banks.

- Non-custodial wallets (you own your assets)
- Military-grade encryption
- Compliance with Federal Reserve, MiCA (Europe), and SEC regulations
- Audited by independent security firms

In 2024, we had ZERO cases of money loss due to security failures.

q9.question: What if diBoaS shuts down one day?
q9.answer:
You lose nothing.

Your crypto stays in wallets that YOU control.
Your traditional investments are held by regulated institutions.

Even if we disappeared, you'd have full access to your funds.

q10.question: Can diBoaS touch my money?
q10.answer:
No. Technically impossible.

The guides give advice and recommendations. But every transaction requires YOUR password, YOUR biometrics, YOUR confirmation.

We have no way to move a penny without your authorization.

q11.question: How much does it cost to use diBoaS?
q11.answer:
Transparent fees:

┌────────────────────┬─────────────┬────────────────┐
│ Operation          │ You pay     │ Others charge  │
├────────────────────┼─────────────┼────────────────┤
│ Open account       │ $0          │ $0 - $50       │
│ Maintain account   │ $0/month    │ $15-$50/month  │
│ Invest $100        │ $0.09       │ $2 - $10       │
│ Transfer $100      │ $0.90       │ $3 - $5        │
│ Instant transfer   │ $0          │ Varies         │
│ within diBoaS      │             │                │
└────────────────────┴─────────────┴────────────────┘

No tricks. No fine print.

We always show you the exact cost before you confirm anything.

q12.question: Is there a mandatory subscription?
q12.answer:
No.

Basic features are free forever.

Advanced features (like ultra-personalized AI or professional analysis) may have optional plans for $12.90/month.

But you can use it just fine without paying anything.

q13.question: How do you make money then?
q13.answer:
Total transparency:

1. Small transaction fee (that 0.09% and 0.9%)

2. Content creators using our platform pay 0.9%
   (much less than YouTube's 10%)

3. Optional subscriptions for advanced features

We earn when you use it. Not when you just keep the account open.
